awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: Nuclear war in the United States is portrayed in a realistic and believable manner. The story is told through the eyes of a woman who is struggling to take care of her family. The entire movie takes place in a small suburban town outside San Francisco. After the nuclear attack, contact with the outside world is pretty much cut off.
plot: The life of a suburban American family is scarred after a nuclear attack.
title: Testament
writers: Carol Amen (based on the story "The Last Testament" by)
